name: Alien Infusion
description:
Shoot em' up in neon ecstasy! Shoot and dodge as you are surrounded by a huge amount of enemies. Absorb their energy and heal up to live another second!

Controls:

  1. A/S to move left and right
  2. F to heal when enemy is down
  3. P / Esc to Pause
  4. LMB to fire
  5. Alt + f4 to exit (just assume I programmed it that way, yeah?)

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
